sentences.literal: Fan Sui was a native of Wei, courtesy name Shu.

sentences.chinese: 游說諸侯，欲事魏王，家貧無以自資，乃先事魏中大夫須賈。
sentences.literal: He traveled among the feudal lords as a persuader, wishing to serve the King of Wei, but being poor with no means to support himself, he first served Xu Jia, the central grand master of Wei.

sentences.chinese: 須賈為魏昭王使於齊，范睢從。
sentences.literal: When Xu Jia served as envoy for King Zhao of Wei to Qi, Fan Sui accompanied him.
They stayed for several months without receiving a reply.

sentences.chinese: 齊襄王聞睢辯口，乃使人賜睢金十斤及牛酒，睢辭謝不敢受。
sentences.literal: King Xiang of Qi heard of Sui's eloquent speech and sent people to grant Sui ten jin of gold and beef and wine. Sui declined with thanks, not daring to accept.

sentences.chinese: 須賈知之，大怒，以為睢持魏國陰事告齊，故得此饋，令睢受其牛酒，還其金。
sentences.literal: Xu Jia learned of this and flew into a rage, believing that Sui had revealed Wei's secret affairs to Qi and thus received these gifts. He commanded Sui to accept the beef and wine but return the gold.
Upon returning home, he remained furious with Sui and reported the matter to the Wei chancellor.

sentences.chinese: 魏相，魏之諸公子，曰魏齊。
sentences.literal: The Wei chancellor was one of Wei's royal princes, named Wei Qi.

sentences.chinese: 魏齊大怒，使舍人笞擊睢，折脅摺齒。
sentences.literal: Wei Qi flew into a rage and ordered his retainers to cane Sui, breaking his ribs and knocking out his teeth.

sentences.chinese: 睢詳死，即卷以簀，置廁中。
sentences.literal: Sui feigned death, was rolled up in a mat, and placed in the latrine.

sentences.chinese: 賓客飲者醉，更溺睢，故僇辱以懲後，令無妄言者。
sentences.literal: The drinking guests got drunk and further urinated on Sui, thus humiliating him to punish others later and ensure no one dared speak rashly.

sentences.chinese: 守者乃請出棄簀中死人。
sentences.literal: The guard then requested permission to throw out the dead man in the mat.
Later Wei Qi regretted, again summoned sought him.

sentences.chinese: 魏人鄭安平聞之，乃遂操范睢亡，伏匿，更名姓曰張祿。
sentences.literal: Wei person Zheng Anping heard it, then led Fan Sui fled, hid, changed name surname called Zhang Lu.
